alert.note: Alert for Plaquemines; St. Bernard (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 19 at 10:14PM CDT until June 19 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: The National Weather Service in New Orleans has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central St. Bernard Parish in southeastern Louisiana... Northwestern Plaquemines Parish in southeastern Louisiana... * Until 1100 PM CDT. * At 1014 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Shell Beach, or 18 miles east of Chalmette, moving south at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Myrtle Grove and Shell Beach. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
